AzureBlade: I am here to show you who you truly are. Can you not see 
that the one you think you are is merely a veil on your spark?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nightstrike::
> 
> Nightsrike body moved. Something inside Nightstrike started to woke 
> up, but it was weak, almost erased... Despair... Fear... something 
> deep inside Nightstrike's spark tried to remember... but not was 
> clear what was.
> 
> A sort of fight started, and soon hate, rage appeared "I don't have 
> friends..."roared a voice that came from Nightstrike's spark"Who're 
> you?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Back at Maximal City, AzureBlade was trying to enter in contact 
> with 
> > Nightstrike's spark.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Can you hear my spark, friend? Do you feel my 
presence?
